summary: This mod gives the armored troll pets a speed boost so they can keep up with you. They are now as fast as a standard running humanoid character, but not as fast as a sprinting horse or a sprinting werewolf.
descriptionHtml:
by Kharnzarro

Description:
This mod gives the armored troll pets a speed boost so they can keep up with you. They are now as fast as a standard running humanoid character, but not as fast as a sprinting horse or a sprinting werewolf.

Requirements:
Dawnguard

Installation:
Put the esp in your data folder and activate it. 

Uninstallation:
Delete this esp.

Compatibility and Bugs? 
None reported so far, please contact me if you find anything.
Won\'t work with other mods that affect troll speed, of course.

This is my first mod, so please leave feedback or comments. Thanks!
author: kharnzarro
